title: DNS System Overview
description: Domain Name System (DNS) is the phonebook of the internet. It translates human-friendly domain names to IP addresses.

records.name: A Record
records.description: Maps a domain to an IPv4 address.

records.name: AAAA Record
records.description: Maps a domain to an IPv6 address.

records.name: CNAME Record
records.description: Maps a domain to another domain (canonical name).

records.name: MX Record
records.description: Specifies mail servers for the domain.

records.name: TXT Record
records.description: Stores text information for sources outside your domain.
